game.title: The Legend of Zelda
game.synopsis: A young hero named Link embarks on a quest to save the land of Hyrule from the evil Ganondorf and awaken the Triforce.
game.beginning: Link awakens in his Kokiri Village home, finding out that he is the chosen one who must save Hyrule.
game.ending: Link defeats Ganondorf in a final battle and restores peace to Hyrule, sealing him away for good.
